data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Date::LastModified gets the last-modified date from a list of zero
    or more files, directories, and/or DBI tables. Date::LastModified
    comes with the tool dlmup, which can be used to update 1+ text files
    with the last-modified date. It was developed to help update a large
    group of HTML files automatically -- Date::LastModified was factored
    out of the dlmup design, actually.
